# thermalState

**Instance Property**

The current thermal state of the system.

## Declaration

```swift
var thermalState: ProcessInfo.ThermalState { get }
```

## Discussion

At higher thermal states your app should reduce usage of system resources. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo/ThermalState-swift.enum].

## Getting the Thermal State

- **ProcessInfo.ThermalState**: Values used to indicate the system’s thermal state.
